packages.name: Telnyx SMS
packages.description: Telnyx SMS allows you to send SMS messages from Rule Machine, webCoRE, and the HE device pages.

packages.name: Springs Window Fashions Shade Drivers
packages.description: Drivers specifically for Sheer and Roller Shade window coverings. Fixes the issue where the standard drivers report 'partially open' when they are opaque and 'closed' when actually sheer.

packages.name: UniFi Presence Drivers
packages.description: Hubitat driver pair for UniFi presence detection with client and hotspot monitoring.

packages.name: APC SmartUPS Status
packages.description: Hubitat driver for monitoring and managing APC Smart-UPS systems — providing reliable runtime statistics, event emission, and control for APC devices.

packages.name: Rain Bird LNK/LNK2 WiFi Module Controller
packages.description: Advanced Hubitat driver providing full local LAN control of Rain Bird LNK/LNK2 WiFi irrigation controllers — including zone, program, and rain delay management. Features automatic time sync, telemetry, adaptive refresh, and support for ESP-TM2 and ESP-Me controllers.
